title: Joe's USA Mens Long Sleeve Polo Shirts in 9 Colors. Regular and Tall Sizes: XS-6XL
features: Joe's USA Men's Classic Long Sleeve Polo Shirts in 9 Colors

An enduring favorite, our comfortable classic polo is anything but ordinary. With superior wrinkle and shrink resistance, a silky soft hand and an incredible range of styles, sizes and colors, it's a first-rate choice for uniforming just about any group. Printed with Joe's USA Logo Inside.
Metal buttons with dyed-to-match plastic rims
Double-needle armhole seams and hem. Side vents
In Sizes: X-Small (32-34), Small (35-37), Medium (38-40), Large (41-43), X-Large (44-46), 2X-Large (47-49), 3X-Large (50-53), In Sizes: 4X-Large (54-57), 5X-Large (58-60), 6X-Large (61-63)
description: Joe's USA - Mens Classic Long Sleeve Polo Shirts in 9 colors and Sizes: XS-6XL and Talls. Printed with Joe's USA Logo Inside.
